home.title: Welcome to MetaCORE Education
home.content: At MetaCORE Education, we are a dedicated online tuition service, committed to helping students reach their full academic potential. Whether you're preparing for GCSEs, A Levels, or seeking support in other subjects, we are here to guide you every step of the way.

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.content: We provide specialised tuition in a variety of subjects to help students excel in their academic journey.

subjectDescriptions.English Language: Develop strong communication skills and master the nuances of the English language.
subjectDescriptions.English Literature: Explore classic and contemporary literature, enhancing analytical and interpretative skills.
subjectDescriptions.Mathematics: Build a solid foundation in mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques.
subjectDescriptions.Physics: Understand the fundamental laws that govern the universe and their practical applications.
subjectDescriptions.Chemistry: Delve into the world of atoms, molecules, and chemical reactions.
subjectDescriptions.Biology: Explore the science of life, from cellular processes to ecosystem dynamics.

personalizedLearning.title: Personalised Learning for Every Student
personalizedLearning.content: At MetaCORE Education, we understand that each student has unique strengths, weaknesses, and learning styles. Our personalised approach ensures that every student receives the support they need to succeed.

features.title: Initial Assessment
features.description: We begin with a comprehensive assessment to determine the appropriate starting point for each student's studies.

features.title: Tailored Curriculum
features.description: Based on the assessment results, we create a personalised curriculum tailored to the student's academic needs and goals.

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: We continuously monitor each student's progress, providing regular feedback and adjusting the learning plan as needed.

tutors.title: Our Professional Tutors
tutors.content: Our tutors are not only experienced but also passionate about teaching. They provide focused, one-on-one online sessions that are designed to build confidence and understanding in the subject matter.

profiles.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
profiles.description: With over 10 years of teaching experience, Dr. Johnson specializes in making complex mathematical and physical concepts accessible to students of all levels.

profiles.name: Mr. David Chen
profiles.description: A published author and experienced educator, Mr. Chen is passionate about nurturing students' love for language and literature.

profiles.name: Dr. Emily Patel
profiles.description: With a PhD in Biochemistry, Dr. Patel brings real-world scientific experience to her engaging and informative lessons.

mentoring.title: Mentoring and Progress Tracking
mentoring.content: In addition to tutoring, we offer mentoring services to help students stay on track and develop a growth mindset.

services.title: Personal Academic Mentors
services.description: Each student is assigned a personal academic mentor who provides guidance, support, and motivation throughout their learning journey.

services.title: Progress Monitoring
services.description: Our mentors closely monitor each student's progress, providing regular feedback and ensuring they are on the right path towards achieving their academic targets.

services.title: Motivational Support
services.description: We help students develop effective study habits, time management skills, and a positive attitude towards learning.

counselling.title: Psychological Support and Counselling
counselling.content: Academic success is closely linked to emotional well-being. We offer counselling and support services to help students cope with stress, anxiety, and other challenges that may impact their studies.

services.title: Emotional Well-being
services.description: Our counsellors provide a safe space for students to discuss their concerns and develop strategies for maintaining emotional balance.

services.title: Stress Management
services.description: We teach students effective techniques for managing academic stress and maintaining a healthy work-life balance.

services.title: Counselling Services
services.description: Professional counsellors are available to help students address personal issues that may be affecting their academic performance.

whyMetacore.title: Why Choose MetaCORE Education?
whyMetacore.content: MetaCORE Education offers a unique blend of personalized learning, expert tutoring, and comprehensive support to ensure every student reaches their full potential.

reasons.title: Tailored Programmes
reasons.description: We create customized learning plans that cater to each student's individual needs and goals, ensuring maximum effectiveness and progress.

reasons.title: Expert Tutors
reasons.description: Our tutors are subject specialists with years of teaching experience and a passion for education, dedicated to your success.

reasons.title: Holistic Approach
reasons.description: We go beyond academic learning, supporting students with mentoring and mental well-being services for comprehensive development.

reasons.title: Convenient Online Learning
reasons.description: Our flexible online sessions allow students to learn from the comfort of their own homes, with interactive and engaging content.

getStarted.title: Get Started with MetaCORE Education
getStarted.content: Begin your journey towards academic excellence with MetaCORE Education. Here's how to get started:

steps.title: Book an Assessment
steps.description: Schedule your initial assessment to determine your current level and learning needs.

steps.title: View Our Study Plans
steps.description: Explore our range of study plans and choose the one that best fits your goals.

steps.title: Join a Lesson
steps.description: Experience a trial lesson with one of our expert tutors.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Our Newsletter
newsletter.content: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest updates on our courses, study tips, and educational resources.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Have questions or need more information? Get in touch with us!
